name: Uki-uki Tsuri Tengoku: Kawa Monogatari
summary:
Uki Uki Tsuri Tengoku - Kawa Monogatari in the second game in the Teichiku fishing games for PlayStation.

Those games features fishing in islands. As a in the first game in the series the game uses the classic first person perspective. This time the game features 2 different game modes a story mode in which the player can try to catch fishes in different places of the island, watch animals in one part of the island and compete in fishing tournaments, the other game mode is free fishing in which the player select a fishing spot and try to catch fishes. The game features different fish species and fishing spots. The game features also a complete encyclopedia with a lot of different kind of fish species and recipes that are unlockables catching them in the story mode.

name: Uki Uki Tsuri Tengoku: Ningyo Densetsu no Nazo
summary:
Uki Uki Tsuri Tengoku - Ningyo densetsu no nazo begins when the player's character (a fisherman) is taken by a plane to Mermaid Island (a fictional place where there are a lot of different fishing spots). The game features conversations with the island people and different fishing spots (with different fishing types) and lures.

Easy to use and with a great variety of fish species the game got a great database of fishes and features a lot of hours of play. All the game use a first person perspective in the adventure and the fighing part. The player can fish on land or use a boat to go to other fishing spot of the island.

name: Ukrainian Shield: Iraq
summary: Take command in a realistic RTS strategy highlighting Ukraine's peacekeeping mission in Iraq. Lead your forces, call in powerful support, and complete a series of unique missions.

name: Uktena 64: Ultimate
summary: A dark comedy horror game with a N64 aesthetic.

name: Ukrainian Ninja
summary: Ukrainian Ninja is a multiplayer platformer game for Windows. The Ninja shoots and slashes, using weapons sold by the trader to clear each world.

name: Ukraine Defense Force Tactics
summary:
Ukraine Defense Force Tactics is a turn-based tactics game in which you lead a small force of Ukrainian units fighting against a seemingly endless deluge of Russian invaders. You will have to outsmart and outmaneuver an overwhelming force of enemies using combined infantry-and-armor tactics and an array of special Stratagems.
Your goal is to destroy as many enemies as possible before needing to retreat your forces. By defeating enemies you gain Glory which then can be used to upgrade your units and unlock new ones.

name: Ukrainien Agent
summary: You play as a Ukrainian intelligence agent. Having penetrated into the lair of the enemy, you have to do a heroic deed, to divert to themselves the maximum attention.

name: Ukiyo
summary: Ukiyo is a story-based adventure game set in cyberspace. You control the main character Kai, a samurai cat, as he explores the cyberspace. Enjoy a unique world that combines Japanese art style and cyberpunk.

name: Ukiyo no Shishi
summary: A third person samurai game set in the edo period, where the player joins the anti-shogunate forces of Ryoma Sakamoto.

name: Ukko & Guara: Stellarbound
summary:
Ukko is a reindeer from Finland and Guará is a maned-wolf from Brazil. One ordinary day, a shooting star falls into planet Earth breaking itself into two parts. The star pieces landed at the north and southern hemisphere, being found by each of our heroes.

Join Ukko and Guará on their adventure to reunite the halves of the star and restore its powers while trying to complete many fun puzzles along the way. Beware, as the broken star's power is unstable and has, in some way, influenced the relationship between the characters and their environments.

name: Uki Uki Tsuri Tengoku: Uogami Densetsu wo Oe
summary:
Uki Uki Tsuri Tengoku Nagami Densetsu Oe is the latest one in the Teichiku fishing games for Playstation.

Those games features fishing in islands. As a difference with the other games in the series the game uses the classic first person perspective and a third person perspective for the fishing part. This time the game takes place in the island of Hatsune and features lighthouses, fishing boats and different fish species and fishing spots. A lot of fish to be catched and different boats to use.

The game features a complete encyclopedia with a lot of different kind of fish species.

name: Ukiyo no Roushi
summary: A third person samurai game set in the edo period, where the player controls a solder in the pro-Shogunate Shinsengumi force.

name: Ukraine Total Defense
summary: Ukraine Total Defense is a tower defense game about the Ukraine war.

name: Ukemeowy
summary: In the world of Ukemeowy, you play as an ukulele player, you can mix and match chords to your liking and create the tune you like. Enjoy the vast green scenery as you play the ukulele to your heart's content.

name: Ukraina Battle Tank!: Putin Edition
summary: Awaken inside a battle Tank in the middle of nowhere around Ukraine. You have to fight for your life against the invasion of the angry Russian tanks and Mr. Putin junior's henchman while vibing with hardbass. Be the slavic bullet hell.

name: Ukrainian ball in search of gas
summary: You play as a man turned into a ball and you need to steal all the gas from the forest at all costs.

name: Ukrainian Farmy
summary:
In Ukrainian Farmy you become one of the scariest combatants on the Ukrainian battlefield - the Ukrainian tractor driver.

It is an arcade game where you challenge yourself against time and "high-precision" artillery bombardments, and capture as many Russian tanks, trucks, and APCs as you can.

name: Uknon Jones & Guynelk: Awesome!
summary: After a tragedy, Uknon Jones, Guynelk and Elsa decide to meet the doctor Gamma to save their friends. Explore this open world and find all the hidden G-atoms in the world to power the time machine from the doctor to hope to change things!

name: Ukraine War Stories
summary: Ukraine War Stories is a set of visual novels about the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine. Set in the early months of the war, it tells the stories of civilians trapped on Russian-occupied territory. All stories are based on real events and eyewitness accounts.

name: Uka & Haruka: Hentai Puzzle 18+
summary: "Uka & Haruka: Hentai Puzzle 18+" is a puzzle game in which the player needs to collect images of girls by rotating the puzzle pieces, while watching beautiful girls in parallel.

name: Ukhar
summary: Plunge yourself into sword and sorcery adventures, roll and slash through your enemies!

name: Ukosz
summary: Survive in a post-soviet style brutalist city...

name: Uki-Uki-Tengoku 2
summary: Retro 2D side-scrolling shooter with pixel art. Control a penguin (Laser), a fish (Firebreath), and a human (Railgun) to achieve a high score!

name: Ukraine War 2022
summary: Ukraine War 2022 is a real-time, tactical land and air warfare simulation game focusing on the ongoing war between Ukraine and Russia.

name: UK Truck Simulator
summary: UK Truck Simulator is a vehicle simulation game from SCS Software. As an employee of a virtual haulage company, players can travel between 18 major cities in the United Kingdom, collecting and delivering cargo. Ultimately, players have the option to purchase their own lorry, and drive as an independent driver, choosing their cargo and delivery locations.

name: Uktena
summary: Hunt and topple Gargantuans to keep the enemy at bay in this atmospheric Titan-Rush Game!

name: Ukrainian Fight Drone Simulator
summary: "Ukrainian Fight Drone Simulator" is an ultra-realistic combat simulator for future military personnel and FPV enthusiasts. Improve your piloting skills, learn mission planning strategies, and feel the adrenaline of modern combat!

name: Uknon Jones & Guynelk 2
summary: After Jones' friends are rescued, Jones discovers that his grandfather has mysteriously disappeared. He was looking for a mythical treasure called: "Crystal Cereal". Jones, Guynelk, Elsa and Princess Saphir decide to search for the crystal cereals to find Jones' grandfather.
